answers.author: Evelina Moulder
answers.text:
The city of Charlotte, NC, has a housing trust fund. Zelleka Biermann is the program director. She may be reached at 704-336-2482. I know she will be glad to help you.
Best regards,

author: David Dollahon
text:
Does anyone have an affordable housing land bank or trust fund that is establised by their local government?   If so, how have you financed it or purchased properties?   Do you have a committee that reviews and approves request for funds and/or land, and if so, do you have policy guides, forms, or other documents that you can share.
We have established our land bank and trust fund, but are looking for forms and functions in how awards are made.
Thanks.
title: Affordable Housing Land Bank or Trust Fund
